name: Desktop Man
description:
More DesktopMan Video on Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLZ3l_uTWkrvOSnE0jZC_ZqPfjzu82secK


With the DesktopMan, you can now have living men on your desktop! He will always be with you, even while having other windows open. Supports STEAM workshop.

Features

  • Includes numerous editing options so you can customize men model and combinations.
  • Gives your desktop some life with amazing AI men.
  • Steam Workshop support, which makes downloading men models easier than ever.
  • Since DesktopMan is not a live wallpaper, it can act on top of any window or under it.
  • The DesktopMan characters can be interacted with by using your mouse cursor,With the help of new AI Technology they look like they are alive.
  • Compatible with all other software and live wallpapers.
  • Supports Windows 7 (with Aero), 8, 8.1 and 10
